mapper.select: SELECT /* selectEmpListByDeptNo */ EMPNO, ENAME, DEPTNO, JOB, MGR, HIREDATE, COMM, SAL FROM EMP WHERE DEPTNO = #{deptNo}

SELECT /* selectEmp */ E.EMPNO, E.ENAME, E.DEPTNO, D.DNAME AS DEPTNAME, E.JOB, E.MGR, E2.ENAME AS MGRNAME, E.HIREDATE, E.COMM, E.SAL FROM EMP E LEFT JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO, EMP E1 LEFT JOIN EMP E2 ON E1.MGR = E2.EMPNO WHERE E.EMPNO = E1.EMPNO AND E.EMPNO = #{empNo}

SELECT /* selectEmpList */ E.EMPNO, E.ENAME, E.DEPTNO, D.DNAME AS DEPTNAME, E.JOB, E.MGR, E2.ENAME AS MGRNAME, E.HIREDATE, E.COMM, E.SAL FROM EMP E LEFT JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPTNO = D.DEPTNO, EMP E1 LEFT JOIN EMP E2 ON E1.MGR = E2.EMPNO WHERE E.EMPNO = E1.EMPNO
mapper.update: UPDATE /* updateEmp */ EMP SET ENAME = #{ename, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPTNO = #{deptNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, JOB = #{job, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MGR = #{mgr, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, HIREDATE = #{hireDate, jdbcType=DATE}, COMM = #{comm, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, SAL = #{sal, jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE EMPNO = #{empNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* deleteEmp */ FROM EMP WHERE EMPNO = #{empNo}
